channel.title: Project Ex
channel.description:
[size=14pt]I have no clue why the pictures are giant, dont ask. xD[/size] I don't want to go too far into depth lol. I just want to post some pictures and info. I will have this server up by Friday, all I have to do is add milestone capes, comp cape, max cape, etc. And then I have to add all the stats for these. xD except death cape. ._.
What I'm going to be adding: ~ All Specials ~ ~ Milestone capes 10-90 ~ ~ Max Cape ~ ~ Comp Cape ~ ~ Pkp system + unique shop ~ ~ Slayer Task system + Slayer Shop ~ ~ AND MUCH MORE ~
Questions you might ask?: Where can I play this server?: potato. its not released to the public yet. I still have to add a lot of shit I tell ya... A lot of shit...
Will you release the source and client anytime soon?: Yes, when the server dies out and we get no players what so ever.
I will more questions below. :p
The models I dumped from scratch, took me a couple of days to finish but oh well. :P I didn't get to do the server sided things yet such as stats and item id. [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2eojsax.jpg[/img]
Wearing ganodermic, polypore, steadfast boots, and tokhaar-kal. [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/mtmmwk.jpg[/img]
death cape, not added by me. I had to rewrite the whole cape in the client from scratch... it was glitched out and nulled the client every time i tried to equip it. [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2hnt4s8.jpg[/img]
[size=18pt]Whenever we shutdown the server I will clean the source (char files, ban files, etc.) I will release it.[/size] For a base, I used a blank project insanity, I know tokhaar-kal is already added in it, but it was invisible... I had to rewrite that also and redump the models for it... it was a pain in the ass, literally... I had a fuck load of errors the first 3 times.

Are you actually going to work on this project seriously, or just edit a few things then release it?

I coded it from scratch? I didn’t even add shops yet lol home is Canafis.

If you say so.

Lol.
[/quote]
What’s so funny? Also, your pictures are huge.[/quote]
Nothing. xD and i know. lol.

item.title: Project Ex
item.dc:creator: @Teemo Teemo
item.description:
@Teemo wrote:

[size=14pt]I have no clue why the pictures are giant, dont ask. xD[/size]
I don’t want to go too far into depth lol. I just want to post some pictures and info. I will have this server up by Friday, all I have to do is add milestone capes, comp cape, max cape, etc. And then I have to add all the stats for these. xD except death cape. ._.

What I’m going to be adding:
~ All Specials ~
~ Milestone capes 10-90 ~
~ Max Cape ~
~ Comp Cape ~
~ Pkp system + unique shop ~
~ Slayer Task system + Slayer Shop ~
~ AND MUCH MORE ~

Questions you might ask?:
Where can I play this server?:
potato. its not released to the public yet. I still have to add a lot of shit I tell ya… A lot of shit…

Will you release the source and client anytime soon?:
Yes, when the server dies out and we get no players what so ever.

I will more questions below.

The models I dumped from scratch, took me a couple of days to finish but oh well.
I didn’t get to do the server sided things yet such as stats and item id.

2eojsax.jpg1024×768

Wearing ganodermic, polypore, steadfast boots, and tokhaar-kal.

mtmmwk.jpg962×669

death cape, not added by me. I had to rewrite the whole cape in the client from scratch… it was glitched out and nulled the client every time i tried to equip it.

2hnt4s8.jpg962×669

[size=18pt]Whenever we shutdown the server I will clean the source (char files, ban files, etc.) I will release it.[/size]
For a base, I used a blank project insanity, I know tokhaar-kal is already added in it, but it was invisible… I had to rewrite that also and redump the models for it… it was a pain in the ass, literally… I had a fuck load of errors the first 3 times.
